entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%

Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
